content: cold snap by angeline webb of knitrelief designs finished measurements one size approx 11 wide and 42 long easily adjusted to make a longer scarf yarn approx 400 yards dk weight sample shown in knit picks swish dk 100% superwash wool 123yds/50g cobblestone heather qty 4 needles us 7 4 5mm or size to obtain gauge gauge 20 sts and 28 row = 4 in andalusian stitch blocked gauge is not crucial for this project however different gauge will result in different size and yardage requirements notions yarn needle button s cold snap is a comfy and cozy scarf with an all-over thermal-like texture scarf is knit flat check out the step-by-step video tutorial scarf is styled with an instabutton i like these because i don t have to commit to a specific buttonhole placement and i can easily style scarves and shawls in a variety of ways cold snap matches the deep frost pullover photo on page 2 share your finished project photos in your ravelry notebook for all to see for pattern support contact
